title: Category:Universal Tracking Application
content:

This category contains articles related to the Universal Tracking Application™, or UTA.
The UTA is a highly customizable 
application
 within the 
SmartSimple
 framework used by organisations to create unique 
applications
 to meet their specific tracking needs.
 
The Universal Tracking Application (UTA)
 
A simplified view of a Universal Tracking Application (UTA) from a grants management perspective.
Training related articles are listed in sequential order below:
